text: I never passed A math since Sec 3, but I really improved and got A1 for my recent Sec 4 WA2 as the tutors here were able to explain concepts very clearly allowing me to understand the subject very well very easily and quickly.
I improved from c5 to a1 for my sec one wa 2 exam after joining math vigilante. The tuition teacher also very good at explaining questions and always made time to go through my mistakes

Spent 1 year here with the best teacher Mr Lai, and he really performed some kind of magic to bring both my maths from F9/Fail to both A2s. His teaching methods and faith in our abilities was refreshing and enabled me to achieve my best in my exams. He is always very encouraging towards us and is also extremely patient. I would really recommend friends/family to come here!
In primary school i used to get AL5/6 for math but now im getting all A1

Mr Lai is a very good tutor who has helped my son make very big improvements in A maths and helped him achieve an A1 in his Sec 4 prelim results. He is always on time and explains maths concepts patiently and clearly. I highly recommend him to anyone looking for an effective A Maths tutor.
